feedstock.comments: MELD uses 0.5 inch square rod feedstock

bead_geometry.comments: Capsule-shaped bead with rectangular center and semi-circular ends

calibration.comments: Tune these values to match physical print results

tuning_guide.correction_factor: Multiplicative adjustment - increase if calculated volume is too small
tuning_guide.area_offset: Additive adjustment in mmÂ² - use for systematic offset
validation_process: 1. Print a test part with known parameters
3. Compare with calculated volume from CSV data
4. Adjust correction_factor to match: actual_volume / calculated_volume
5. Use area_offset for fine-tuning if needed
